    • Method Detail

      • isRedirectRequested

        boolean isRedirectRequested(Request<?> request,
                            org.apache.http.HttpResponse response,
                            java.util.ArrayList<java.net.URL> previouslyVisited)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Determine if a request should be redirected to a new location, given the HttpResponse from the server
        Parameters:
        request - A Request
        response - The response from the server, including statusCode and headers. But no HttpEntity.
        previouslyVisited - All previously visited links in this redirect chain
        Returns:
        true if the network should redirect, else false
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getRedirectLocation

        java.net.URL getRedirectLocation(Request<?> request,
                                 org.apache.http.HttpResponse response,
                                 java.util.ArrayList<java.net.URL> previouslyVisited)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Determine the new location the request is expected to be redirected to given the HttpResponse from the server and the current execution context.
        Parameters:
        request - A Request
        response - The response from the server, including statusCode and headers. But no HttpEntity.
        previouslyVisited - All previously visited links in this redirect chain
        Returns:
        A redirect URL
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • onRedirectComplete

        void onRedirectComplete(Request<?> request,
                        java.util.ArrayList<java.net.URL> urls)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        When the final URL in a chain of redirects have been resolved, this method is called. In some instances the etilbudsavis.dk APi will return the content of a request in the redirect url, rather than in the body, this would be a great time to resolve those.

        To avoid network overhead of downloading an irrelevant body content, this method can optionally throw an exception.

        Parameters:
        request - A Request
        urls - All previously visited links in this redirect chain
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - to avoid reading the body of the response.
